auth.accountCreated: Account created. Check your email to verify.
auth.accountLocked: Account locked. Try again in {minutes} minutes.
auth.tooManyAttempts: Account locked due to too many attempts. Try again in 30 minutes.
auth.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please log in again.
auth.resetEmailSent: If the email exists, a code was sent.
auth.passwordUpdated: Password updated. Please log in again.
auth.emailNotVerified: Please verify your email before logging in. Check your inbox.
auth.emailVerified: Email verified successfully! You can now log in.
auth.alreadyVerified: Email is already verified. You can log in.
auth.verifyLinkExpired: Verification link has expired. Please register again.
user.emailInUse: Email is already in use by another account
shipping.pickedUp: Your order has been picked up by the carrier.
shipping.inTransit: Your order is on its way.
shipping.outForDelivery: Your order is out for delivery today.
shipping.exception: There was a problem with your order delivery.
review.mustPurchase: You can only review products you have purchased and paid for.
review.alreadyReviewed: You have already reviewed this product.
review.noPermission: You do not have permission to delete this review
address.hasOrders: Cannot delete this address because it has associated orders.
category.hasProducts: Cannot delete: Category has associated products.
product.categoryNotFound: The specified category does not exist
middleware.tooManyAuth: Too many authentication attempts. Try again in 15 minutes.
middleware.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Try again later.
middleware.tooManyUploads: Too many uploads. Try again in 15 minutes.
middleware.tooManyResets: Too many recovery attempts. Try again in 1 hour.
middleware.invalidFormat: Invalid format. Only images allowed (JPEG, PNG, WEBP).
middleware.invalidMagicBytes: File "{name}" is not a valid image. Bytes do not match JPEG, PNG, WebP or GIF.
middleware.mismatchMime: File "{name}": declared extension ({declared}) does not match actual content ({detected}).
validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordUpper: Must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.passwordLower: Must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.passwordNumber: Must contain at least one number
validation.passwordSymbol: Must contain at least one symbol
validation.skuRequired: SKU is required and must be unique
validation.categoryMinChars: Name must have at least 3 characters
validation.ratingRange: Rating must be between 1 and 5 stars
email.verifyDescription: Use the code below or click the button to verify your email address and activate your account.
email.verifyExpiry: This code and link expire in 24 hours.
email.ignoreIfNotYou: If you did not request this code, ignore this message.
email.shipment.pickedUpDesc: Your order has been picked up by the carrier and is on its way to the distribution center.
email.shipment.inTransitDesc: Your order is traveling to you.
email.shipment.outForDeliveryDesc: Your order is out for delivery today. Get ready!
email.shipment.deliveredDesc: Your order has been delivered successfully!
email.shipment.returnedDesc: Your order was returned. Contact support for more information.
email.shipment.updateDesc: There is an update on your order.
email.shipment.supportNote: If you have any questions, contact our support team.
email.order.shippingNotice: We will notify you when your order is shipped.
